summary: Add Swarm capacity/tuning support runbooks with approval/apply flow and expand deterministic regression coverage

changes.description: Add swarm_capacity_summary to inspect node CPU/memory capacity, placement failures, and manager disk pressure for a target environment.
Add swarm_tuning_profile_summary and swarm_tuning_profile_apply to propose planner-backed tuning profiles, require approval, and optionally apply live service resource updates.
Expand tests for command policy modes, tuning profile blending/pruning, support-runbook helper logic, and tuning/capacity approval edge cases.
